content: Software Engineer (2024 – Present) — Designed and implemented backend APIs using TypeScript. Built authentication and authorization systems using JWT and session-based mechanisms. Designed role-based access control (RBAC). Implemented secure media access using cloud storage with temporary access tokens. Integrated payment gateways (2C2P, Maya), Google Maps APIs, courier services, and WebSockets for real-time updates. Automated blog post generation workflows using Cloudflare AI. Tackling DDD (Domain-driven Design) for multi-platform applications.
